mapper.insert: insert into board (mno, title, sub_title, writer, topic, state, description, price, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, end_date, board_img) values (#{mno}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{writer}, #{topic}, #{state}, #{description}, #{price}, #{keyword1}, #{keyword2}, #{keyword2}, #{endDate}, #{boardImg})
mapper.select: select a.bno, a.mno, a.title, a.sub_title, a.writer, topic, state, a.description, price, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, a.end_date, a.final_price, a.board_img, cheer, m.user_name from board a left join member m on a.mno = m.mno where bno = #{bno};
select count(bno) from board where mno = #{mno}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, sub_title = #{subTitle}, writer = #{writer}, topic = #{topic}, state = #{state}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, keyword1 = #{keyword1}, keyword2 = #{keyword2}, keyword3 = #{keyword3}, end_date = #{endDate}, board_img = #{boardImg} where bno = #{bno}
